mapper.select: SELECT ebc.BDD_CMP_ID AS "bddCmpId", es.SHT_ID AS "shtId" FROM EVAL_BDD_CMP ebc INNER JOIN EVAL_SHT es ON ebc.SHT_INFO_ID = es.SHT_INFO_ID WHERE ebc.SHT_INFO_ID = #{shtInfoId} GROUP BY ebc.BDD_CMP_ID , es.SHT_ID
SELECT BDD_CMP_ID, SHT_INFO_ID, BDD_CMP_NM, BDD_CMP_NBR FROM EVAL_BDD_CMP WHERE SHT_INFO_ID = #{shtInfoId} ORDER BY BDD_CMP_NBR ASC
SELECT BDD_CMP_ID, SHT_INFO_ID, BDD_CMP_NM, BDD_CMP_NBR FROM EVAL_BDD_CMP WHERE BDD_CMP_ID = #{bddCmpId}

SELECT ebc.BDD_CMP_ID, ebc.BDD_CMP_NM, ebc.BDD_CMP_NBR FROM EVAL_BDD_CMP ebc WHERE ebc.SHT_INFO_ID = #{shtInfoId} ORDER BY ebc.BDD_CMP_NBR DESC
LIMIT 3 OFFSET #{pageNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EVAL_BDD_CMP ebc WHERE ebc.SHT_INFO_ID = #{shtInfoId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ebc.BDD_CMP_NM ORDER BY ebc.BDD_CMP_NBR) AS BDD_CMP_NM FROM EVAL_BDD_CMP ebc WHERE ebc.SHT_INFO_ID = #{shtInfoId}
